_comment: if you change this file, do yarn i18n

team.channelEmptyWelcomeTXt: This is the beginning of the #{{channel}} channel

createTeamModal.title: Create a team
createTeamModal.subtitle: Customize your team
createTeamModal.text: Your team is where you and your friends hangout Make yours and start talking.
createTeamModal.text2: Give your new team a personality with a name and online visibility you can always change it later.

createChannelModal.title: Create a channel
createChannelModal.text: Give your new channel a personality with a name and online visibility you can always change it later.
